description.zh: Peppermint Ticket Management 是一个专为帮助台和服务台设计的工单管理系统，用于管理内部员工和客户的请求。该项目最初是为了展示 React 与 Node.js 技能而构建的投资组合项目，现已发展为具有现代 UI 和部署能力的完整解决方案。该系统以易用性和高投资回报率为核心，提供高效的请求处理方式。
description.en: Peppermint Ticket Management is a ticket management system designed to help helpdesks and service desks manage internal staff and customer requests. Initially built as a portfolio project to demonstrate React and Node.js skills, it has evolved into a fully-featured solution with a modern UI and deployment capabilities. The system offers a simple, efficient way to handle service requests with a focus on usability and ROI.

feature.zh:
## 产品优势:

- 提供比 Zendesk 等企业级工单系统更具成本效益的替代方案
- 部署和使用简便，设置门槛低
- 响应式设计确保在各类设备上均具备良好可用性

## 功能列表:

- 支持 Markdown 编辑器和文件上传的工单创建功能
- 客户历史记录日志
- 基于 Markdown 的支持待办事项的笔记本
- 支持从手机到 4K 屏幕的响应式设计
- 支持通过 Docker 和 PM2 多环境部署
- 简洁直观的用户界面与逻辑清晰的工作流程
feature.en:
## Benefits:

- Offers a cost-effective alternative to enterprise ticketing systems like Zendesk
- Easy to deploy and use with minimal setup
- Responsive design ensures usability across all device types

## Features:

- Ticket Creation with markdown editor and file uploads
- A log of client history
- Markdown-based Notebook with todo lists
- Responsive design for mobile to 4K screens
- Multi-deployment support via Docker and PM2
- Simple and intuitive user interface with logical workflow
